title: Attempting to reconnect
body:
I playing lol with my desktop and when i join the game,its always show attempting to reconnect with mostly ping 45ms or sometime ping 500ms. 
and I try use my laptop play on same network at same time, my laptop can play very well. so anyone can help my solve this problem.

replies.body: Your desktops network settings might have something a little different compared to your laptop settings, so let's make sure to check up on those by following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you notice any changes or not!
